content: You can disable header in the mobile version to limit access to the {{productName}} sections (just like disabling the left menu in the desktop version).

comment.text: This translation key describes the content that will be displayed when users disable the header on mobile devices, explaining its purpose as limiting access to specific sections of a product. It appears in a UI component related to panel settings and is used for accessibility purposes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "ترويسة" (tarwisa) for "header" is technically correct but sounds awkward and is not commonly used in this context. A more natural phrasing would be using a more general term like "شريط الرأس" (sharee' ar-ra's) or simply omitting it and referring to the entire top section.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "شريط الرأس" (sharee' ar-ra's) or a more descriptive phrase that conveys the meaning of 'header' in this context, or rephrasing to avoid the term entirely.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "söndürmək" (to extinguish/turn off) is not the best fit for 'disable' in this context. A more accurate translation would convey deactivation or removal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mobil versiyada başlığı deaktiv edə bilərsiniz (masaüstü versiyada sol menyunu silmək kimi).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The structure of the comparison "just like disabling the left menu in the desktop version" is slightly awkward in Azerbaijani. It could be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mobil versiyada başlığı deaktiv edə bilərsiniz, tıpkı masaüstü versiyada sol menyunu söndürmək kimi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'header' is translated as 'záhlaví', which is technically correct but a bit formal and uncommon in this context. A more natural and understandable translation might be 'hlavičku'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'header' as 'hlavičku'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "όπως ακριβώς απενεργοποιείτε" is slightly verbose and less natural in this context. A more concise phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: όπως απενεργοποιείτε

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "ylätunniste" is a direct translation of "header" but might not be the most natural way to express it in Finnish in this context. "Pääotsikko" or "otsikko" could be more suitable depending on the specific UI element being referred to.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'pääotsikko' or 'otsikko' instead of 'ylätunniste' for better readability and naturalness. The best choice would depend on the precise nature of the header being described.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "identique à" (identical to) might not be the most natural way to express 'just like' in this context. It sounds a bit formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous pouvez désactiver l'en-tête dans la version mobile pour limiter l'accès aux sections de {{productName}} (comme la désactivation du menu de gauche dans la version de bureau).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "վերնագիրը" (vernagiri) translates to 'header' but in this context, 'navigation bar' or 'navigation menu' would be more accurate and natural in Armenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating as: "նավիգացիոն շարաբանը" (navigatsion sharabani) or a similar equivalent for 'navigation bar/menu'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "աշխատասեղանի տարբերակում ձախ ընտրացանկն անջատելը" (ashkhatasghani tarberakume dzakh entratsankn anjatelum) is a bit literal. A more natural phrasing would express the idea of disabling a sidebar or similar functionality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like: "աշխատասեղանի տարբերակում ձախ դրույթները ծածկելու համար" (ashkhatasghani tarberakume dzakh drouyte nery tsadqeluy hamar) – which means 'to hide the left options on the desktop version'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of parentheses in the Italian translation feels slightly awkward. While grammatically correct, it's not as fluid as it could be.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puoi disabilitare l'intestazione nella versione mobile per limitare l'accesso alle sezioni {{productName}}, come puoi disabilitare il menu a sinistra nella versione desktop.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "することができます" (suru koto ga dekimasu) implies ability, but the English suggests permission or a specific action enabled. A more accurate phrasing would convey that the user *chooses* to disable the header.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: モバイル版でヘッダーを無効にすることで、{{productName}}セクションへのアクセスを制限できます。デスクトップ版で左メニューを無効にするのと同じです。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'のと同じです' is a bit abrupt at the end. While not incorrect, it could be slightly improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: モバイル版でヘッダーを無効にすることで、{{productName}}セクションへのアクセスを制限できます。デスクトップ版で左メニューを無効にするのと同様です。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parenthesis usage is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it sounds less natural in Korean.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 모바일 버전에서 헤더를 비활성화하여 {{productName}} 섹션에 대한 액세스를 제한할 수 있습니다. 데스크톱 버전에서 왼쪽 메뉴를 비활성화하는 것과 동일합니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ປິດການທໍາງານ" (pid gaan tham ngan) is a bit literal and can be improved. While technically correct for 'disable', a more natural phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານສາມາດເຊົາໃຊ້ (tham saan chao) ຫຼື ປິດ (pid) header ໃນສະບັບມືຖື...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of parentheses around "ສະບັບ desktop" is slightly awkward. It interrupts the flow of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານສາມາດປິດການທໍາງານ header ໃນສະບັບມືຖື ເພື່ອຈໍາກັດການເຂົ້າເຖິງພາກ {{productName}} (ເຊັ່ນດຽວກັນກັບການປິດການທໍາງານຂອງເມນູຊ້າຍໃນສະບັບ desktop)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'header' is translated as 'antetul'. While 'antet' is a valid translation, 'header' in this context refers to a top navigation bar. A more appropriate translation might be 'bara de navigare superioară' or simply 'bara de sus'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: bara de navigare superioară

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'так же, как' is a somewhat literal translation of 'just like' and might sound slightly unnatural in Russian. A more natural phrasing would better convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вы можете отключить заголовок в мобильной версии, чтобы ограничить доступ к разделам {{productName}} (аналогично отключению левого меню в десктопной версии).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "වැඩතල අනුවාදයේ වම්පස වට්ටෝරුව" is not an accurate translation of "the left menu in the desktop version." 'වට්ටෝරුව' translates to 'flap' or 'cover', not 'menu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: වැඩතල අනුවාදයේ වම්පස මෙනුව

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation is a bit clunky and could be improved for flow. Consider reordering to match the natural flow of Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබට {{productName}} කොටස් වෙත ප්‍රවේශය සීමා කිරීමට, ජංගම අනුවාදයේ ශ්‍රීර්ෂකය අබල කළ හැකිය. වැඩතල අනුවාදයේ මෙන්ම, වම්පස මෙනුව අබල කිරීමේ හැකියාව මෙහි ද ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation uses 'hlavičku' which is the accusative case. Since it's being disabled, the instrumental case ('hlavičkou') might be more grammatically correct, although 'hlavičku' is understandable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'hlavičkou' instead of 'hlavičku' for a slightly more precise grammatical construction.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation uses parentheses ( ) instead of curly braces { } to denote the variable replacement for 'productName'. The English uses curly braces.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change '{{productName}}' to '[productName]' or use curly braces consistently.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "баш као да" (bash kao da) translates to "just as if" which isn't the most natural way to convey the intended meaning of "just like". It makes the sentence slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можете да онемогуц́ите заглавље у мобилној верзији да бисте ограничили приступ одељцима {{productName}}-а (као и да онемогуц́ите леви мени у верзији за десктоп).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "baš kao da onemogućite" is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "poput onemogućavanja" or "kao da onemogućavate".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možete da onemogućite zaglavlje u mobilnoj verziji da biste ograničili pristup odeljcima {{productName}}-a (poput onemogućavanja leveg menija u verziji za desktop).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "-a" in "{{productName}}-a" feels slightly unnatural in Serbian. It's grammatically correct but less common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možete da onemogućite zaglavlje u mobilnoj verziji da biste ograničili pristup odeljcima {{productName}} (poput onemogućavanja leveg menija u verziji za desktop).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "just like disabling the left menu in the desktop version" could be more naturally translated. A direct translation might sound awkward. A more natural phrasing would convey the comparison more effectively.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: masaüstü sürümünde sol menüyü devre dışı bırakmak gibi bir şekilde

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "простору" (prostoru) translates to "space" and doesn't quite fit the context of sections or areas within the product. It's clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ви можете вимкнути заголовок у мобільній версії, щоб обмежити доступ до розділів {{productName}} (подібно до вимкнення лівого меню у версії для настільного комп’ютера).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'подібно до' should likely be 'як' for a more natural flow.  'подібно' is less common and slightly formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ви можете вимкнути заголовок у мобільній версії, щоб обмежити доступ до розділів {{productName}} (як вимкненню лівого меню у версії для настільного комп’ютера).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'header' is translated as 'tiêu đề'. While technically correct, 'header' in this context refers to a UI element and 'thanh tiêu đề' or 'đầu trang' might be more accurate and commonly used in Vietnamese for a UI context. Using 'tiêu đề' implies a title of a document or section, not a UI component.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn có thể tắt thanh tiêu đề trong phiên bản dành cho thiết bị di động để hạn chế quyền truy cập vào các phần {{productName}} (giống như tắt menu bên trái trong phiên bản dành cho máy tính để bàn).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation maintains the use of {{productName}} which is consistent with the source English. This is good. However, ensure that the translation system/implementation will correctly handle this placeholder during the translation process and that it is rendered correctly in the Vietnamese version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed - ensure proper rendering of {{productName}}.
